website_summaries.verdict: Step out in style with these stunning aviators featuring a beautiful rose gold finish and mirrored lenses.
pros: They come with a carrying case
Great price point for a brand-name pair of sunglasses

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses at terrific price!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped at a couple of boutiques and came across this pair of sunglasses. The boutiques were selling them for much more than what Amazon was selling them for. I bought them from Amazon and could not have been much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Maria R. Borzacchini

customer_reviews.title: GET YOUR SHADES - SUMMER IS COMING !!!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son laughs so hard when Mommy puts these on. They look great and he thinks I look like a movie star :) Edit: My lens popped out the 3rd. time I wore them. Amazon customer service provided me with an email to reach the Michael Kors store !!! ~
customer_reviews.author: MELLY Z

customer_reviews.title: Mommy made her look cool
customer_reviews.text: FOr the first time in my life I got this girl a gift she likes...LOL...
customer_reviews.author: miche001

customer_reviews.title: Unless you have a separate case stay away
customer_reviews.text: The case for the glasses does not stay closed which causes excess scratches of the glasses
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly agnew

customer_reviews.title: Would highly reccomend
customer_reviews.text: My mother loved these. No clue if they're real or not but they are great either way!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful. Was impressed they were the real deal. Purchased some before on their official site and these are exactly the same quality. Spent 30 bucks less on here. Highly recommend. Would purchase more on here.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy89

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses at a reasonable price. I get lots of compliments!!
customer_reviews.author: LAmom125

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses! Very classy looking and sturdy. Exactly what I was looking for. Also comes in a nice case. Great value and my new favorite pair of sunnies!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love, love 💕 this pair of sunglasses helps a lot when driving
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the glasses, but the lens pops out of the frame frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a Christmas gift. My daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.author: MLMH

customer_reviews.title: Very Sexy Sun Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I have to give them to my Daughter-inlaw. I am going to buy me a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Torres

customer_reviews.title: Love my new sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied! It's authentic and came brand new in original packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Tran

customer_reviews.title: For girlfriend
customer_reviews.text: The frame came loose multiple times. Girlfriend doesn’t wear them anymore
customer_reviews.author: David Fraser

customer_reviews.title: MK shades
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were darker BUT I love the style the fit and color.
customer_reviews.author: Ladonna walker

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Leave marks on my face and I don't wear it anymore
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: My new faves!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses! They look and feel great on! Sturdy design and they come packaged for a safe arrival. Definitely my new faves!
customer_reviews.author: Tina
